text: Gubernatorial elections were held on 18 September 2016 in nine federal subjects of Russia. All elections passed in one round. In seven federal subjects, there were direct elections of governors, and in two, the governor was be elected by the regional parliaments. None of the incumbent governors had lost the elections. ==Race summary== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Federal Subject !! Incumbent !! Party !! Incumbent status !! Losing candidates !!
